name: tic-tac-toe-game
description: Tic-Tac-Toe: AI vs AI - MXF Multi-Agent Game Demo

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:client
scripts.game: npm run connect-agents & PID=$!; cd client && npm run dev; kill $PID 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3005 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'Cleaned up'
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build:all

author: MXF Team
